posts.post_content:
Last round of T207’s available.....and these are the tough guys. Trying to leverage previous sales while pricing these guys but some are very tough to price. Shoot me a PM about these if I’m off base on any. Prices include shipping.

All are in poor to fair condition. Some could use a bath if that’s your choosing.
